name: Classic Espresso
description: A strong, concentrated shot of coffee with a rich crema.

name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
description: Layered espresso, milk, vanilla syrup, and caramel drizzle over ice.

name: Nitro Cold Brew
description: Smooth cold brewed coffee infused with nitrogen for a creamy texture.

name: Flat White
description: Espresso with velvety microfoam for a rich, smooth taste.

name: Cappuccino
description: Espresso with equal parts steamed milk and foam.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water for a milder flavor.

name: Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and a light layer of foam.

name: Mocha
description: Espresso with chocolate syrup, steamed milk, and whipped cream.

name: Macchiato
description: Espresso 'stained' with a dollop of foamed milk.

name: Affogato
description: Vanilla ice cream drowned in a shot of hot espresso.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: Finely ground coffee boiled with sugar in a cezve.

name: Irish Coffee
description: Hot coffee with Irish whiskey, sugar, and whipped cream.

name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee
description: Strong dark roast with sweetened condensed milk over ice.

name: Red Eye
description: Drip coffee with a shot of espresso for extra caffeine.

name: Black Eye
description: Drip coffee with two shots of espresso for a serious kick.

name: Dalgona Coffee
description: Whipped instant coffee with sugar, served over milk.

name: Bulletproof Coffee
description: Coffee blended with butter and MCT oil for keto energy.

name: Cortado
description: Espresso cut with a small amount of warm milk.

name: Gibraltar
description: Similar to a cortado but served in a small glass.

name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
description: Seasonal espresso drink with pumpkin, cinnamon, and nutmeg.

name: Hazelnut Latte
description: Latte flavored with sweet hazelnut syrup.

name: Vanilla Latte
description: Espresso with vanilla syrup and steamed milk.

name: Caramel Latte
description: Latte with caramel syrup and whipped cream.

name: Coconut Latte
description: Latte made with coconut milk for a tropical twist.

name: Almond Milk Latte
description: Latte made with creamy almond milk.

name: Oat Milk Latte
description: Latte made with smooth oat milk.

name: Iced Latte
description: Espresso with cold milk served over ice.

name: Iced Mocha
description: Chocolatey espresso drink served cold with milk.

name: Iced Vanilla Latte
description: Sweet vanilla latte served over ice.

name: Iced Caramel Latte
description: Caramel-flavored latte served chilled.
